title: Do you have the original will and any codicils
question: Do you have the original will and any codicils?
hintText1: You must send the original will and any codicils to us, not photocopies, as part of your application.
hintText2: By law, we need to see the original will and codicils and keep them as they become a public record.
hintText3: A codicil is a legal document that's a supplement to a will. Codicils list changes and updates to a will and are signed and witnessed the same way as a will.
hintText4: Check if a codicil is attached to the will, or they may be loose pages. The word ‘codicil’ may be at the top of the page.

original.required: Select ‘yes’ if you have the original will and any codicils?
